DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate ability SYSTANE® BALANCE dose 4 time day 30 day increase non-invasive tear film break time baseline , compare saline control , dry eye subject lipid deficiency .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect SYSTANE® BALANCE Tear Film Break Up Time Dry Eye Subjects
DOC.criteria: Read , sign , date information consent ; Willing able follow instruction maintain appointment schedule ; Bestcorrected visual acuity 0.6 logMAR good eye assess Visit 1 ; Must use topical ocular drop approximately 24 hour prior Visit 1 ; Meet protocolspecified criterion dry eye Visit 1 ; Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . History evidence ocular intraocular surgery serious ocular trauma either eye within past six month ; Current punctal occlusion type ( e.g. , collagen plug , silicon plug ) ; History intolerance hypersensitivity component study medication ; History evidence epithelial herpes simplex keratitis ( dendritic keratitis ) ; vaccinia ; active recent varicella viral disease cornea and/or conjunctiva ; chronic bacterial disease cornea and/or conjunctiva and/or eyelid ; mycobacterial infection eye ; and/or fungal disease eye ; Use concomitant topical ocular medication study period ; Use systemic medication may contribute dry eye unless stable dose regimen minimum 30 day prior Visit 1 ; Ocular condition conjunctival infection , iritis , ocular condition may preclude safe administration either drop investigation ; Unwilling discontinue contact lens wear study period . Contact lens wear must discontinue least one week prior Visit 1 . Participation investigational drug device study within 30 day enter study ; Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
